import {makeStyles} from '@material-ui/styles'


const useStyles = ((theme)=>({
    box:{
        position:'absolute',
        zIndex:'999',
        width:'100%',
        height:'100%',
        display:'grid',
        alignItems:'center',
        top:0,
        left:0,
        transition:'0.3s ease-in-out',

       opacity: isOpen ? '100%' : '0',
       top:isOpen ? '0' : '-100%',
    }
}))

export default useStyles
